“As a human being among humans,
in a previous life in the human world,
I had a dwelling built for the Sangha,
surrounded by mango trees.
When the dwelling was completed,🔽and the great work was finished,
I covered it with mangoes,
making cloth-like fruits.
I lit a lamp there,
and fed the supreme assembly.
With my own hands I offered it to the Sangha,
with faith in them.
Because of that, my delightful mango grove
has a large mansion here,
